topic: Large Language Model Safety and Defense Mechanisms

  entities:
    Lang Gao|Researcher
    Xiangliang Zhang|Researcher
    Preslav Nakov|Researcher
    Xiuying Chen|Researcher
    Yueqi Xie|Researcher
    Mansi Phute|Researcher
    Matthew Pisano|Researcher
    Bergeron|Framework
    Neel Jain|Researcher
    Alexander Robey|Researcher
    SmoothLLM|Method
    Jiabao Ji|Researcher
    Zhexin Zhang|Researcher
    Jing Xu|Researcher
    Taeyoun Kim|Researcher
    Yifan Zeng|Researcher
    AutoDefense|Method
    Suyu Ge|Researcher
    MART|Method
    Zhuowen Yuan|Researcher
    RigorLLM|Method
    ChatGPT|Model

  proposition: Lang Gao, Xiangliang Zhang, Preslav Nakov, and Xiuying Chen authored a paper on understanding and defending against jailbreaks in large language models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Lang Gao|CO_AUTHORED|Xiangliang Zhang
    Lang Gao|CO_AUTHORED|Preslav Nakov
    Lang Gao|CO_AUTHORED|Xiuying Chen
    
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Lang Gao|RESEARCHED|Jailbreak Defense
    Xiangliang Zhang|RESEARCHED|Jailbreak Defense
    Preslav Nakov|RESEARCHED|Jailbreak Defense
    Xiuying Chen|RESEARCHED|Jailbreak Defense

  proposition: Yueqi Xie and colleagues proposed defending ChatGPT against jailbreak attacks via self-reminders.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Yueqi Xie|RESEARCHED|ChatGPT
    
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yueqi Xie|PROPOSED|Self-Reminder Defense

  proposition: Mansi Phute and co-authors explored LLM self-defense through self-examination.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Mansi Phute|RESEARCHED|LLM Self-Defense
    Mansi Phute|EXPLORED|Self-Examination Method

  proposition: Matthew Pisano et al. developed Bergeron, a conscience-based alignment framework to combat adversarial attacks.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Matthew Pisano|DEVELOPED|Bergeron
    
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Bergeron|TYPE|Conscience-Based Alignment Framework
    Bergeron|PURPOSE|Combat Adversarial Attacks

  proposition: Neel Jain and researchers presented baseline defenses for adversarial attacks against aligned language models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Neel Jain|PRESENTED|Baseline Defenses
    Neel Jain|RESEARCHED|Adversarial Attack Defense

  proposition: Alexander Robey and colleagues introduced SmoothLLM for defending large language models against jailbreaking attacks.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Alexander Robey|DEVELOPED|SmoothLLM
    
    entity-attribute relationships:
    SmoothLLM|PURPOSE|Defend Against Jailbreaking Attacks

  proposition: Jiabao Ji et al. proposed defending LLMs through semantic smoothing.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Jiabao Ji|PROPOSED|Semantic Smoothing Defense

  proposition: Zhexin Zhang and team suggested defending LLMs through goal prioritization.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Zhexin Zhang|SUGGESTED|Goal Prioritization Defense

  proposition: Jing Xu and researchers developed recipes for safety in open-domain chatbots.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Jing Xu|DEVELOPED|Safety Recipes
    Jing Xu|FOCUSED_ON|Open-Domain Chatbot Safety

  proposition: Taeyoun Kim and co-authors argued that jailbreaking is best solved by definition.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Taeyoun Kim|ARGUED|Jailbreaking Solution Through Definition

  proposition: Yifan Zeng and colleagues created AutoDefense, a multi-agent LLM defense against jailbreak attacks.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Yifan Zeng|DEVELOPED|AutoDefense
    
    entity-attribute relationships:
    AutoDefense|TYPE|Multi-Agent LLM Defense
    AutoDefense|PURPOSE|Prevent Jailbreak Attacks

  proposition: Suyu Ge et al. developed MART for improving LLM safety through multi-round automatic red-teaming.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Suyu Ge|DEVELOPED|MART
    
    entity-attribute relationships:
    MART|PURPOSE|Improve LLM Safety
    MART|METHOD|Multi-Round Automatic Red-Teaming

  proposition: Zhuowen Yuan and researchers created RigorLLM for resilient guardrails against undesired content.
    entity-entity relationships:
    Zhuowen Yuan|DEVELOPED|RigorLLM
    
    entity-attribute relationships:
    RigorLLM|PURPOSE|Create Resilient Guardrails
    RigorLLM|PREVENTS|Undesired Content
